package.json.name: helpme-breathe
package.json.description: Natural breathing exercises for wellness and relaxation

scripts.optimize: npm run build && npm run compress
scripts.compress: gzip -9 -c dist/index.html > dist/index.html.gz && gzip -9 -c dist/assets/*.css > dist/assets/styles.css.gz && gzip -9 -c dist/assets/*.js > dist/assets/scripts.js.gz

package.json.author: Georges Rayess
